climbs.name: Strip Club Beats Church, Ballet Beats Strip Club

content.description: This is a personal favorite! Sit start on the south face with glorious jugs. Move up to the massive rail in the middle of the face utilizing positive feet and tiny (mono to two-finger) pockets. Once at the rail, move downward (!) to the main prow. From there, move to the lip, and find a positive little crimp to utilize in order to top out.
content.protection: Pads and a spotter. The landing has been worked on a bunch, but we still utilized 4 pads and 2 spotters to be safe.
content.location:
There is a downclimb on the east side of the boulder. The boulder is fairly secluded for being able to hear cars move across the cattleguard.

Reference the map and pictures for exact locations of the boulder and the route.

content.description: Sit start using two obvious jugs on the south face. Utilizing tiny pockets and crimps, gain the huge positive rail that cuts the boulder in half. From there, continue up with suspect holds to the rail. The feet are great, so that helps a lot.
content.protection: Pads, spotters, and an awareness of the large boulder behind you after you gain the first positive rail.
content.location: Sit start on the south face. The downclimb requires some work as you have to traverse around the boulder to get off it.
